item.description: 10:00AM Registration -Gift Bag-11:00 Lunch-Putting Contest 10:30-11:30- 12:00 Shotgun-Scramble-Start -Longest Drive to the pin-50-50- contest-5:00PM Dinner-Raffle-Silent Auction $125 per person-18 holes with cart-$500.00 per foursom-Dinner only $35.00 For more information call Jane Rolan (860-529-1353 or Gale Peck (860) 604-4646 Feed the People Charity , Inc. is a 501 (c) 3 nonprofit charity commtted to addressing the issues of hunger and food insecurity in the State of Connecticut. To achieve the goals of this edeavor , we are sponsering a golf tounament on Monday, September 26, 2011 at Quarry Ridge in Portland , CT. Proceeds from this event will go towards helping St. Vincent DePaul Place -Middletown, Rocky Hill Food Bank and South Park Inn-Hartford, CT. The eighteen holes at Quarry Ridge are spectacularly set amon rolling hills and granite rock outcroppings, overlooking the Meshomasic State Forest and Connecticut River. This course was designed by Al Zikorus and Joe Kelly and opened in 1993.
item.name: Feed the People Charity Inc. September 26, 2011 @ Quarry Ridge
